edu.cmu.sei.arche.ui.views
Interface ICellColorProvider

public interface ICellColorProvider

Interface to provide color representation for a given cell of a table view. This is an alternative to org.eclipse.jface.viewers.IColorProvider which only allows setting the color for the entire row.

Author:
Paulo Merson
See Also:
ColoredCellTableViewer

Method Summary

          Provides a background color for the given cell.
 org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color getForeground(java.lang.Object element, int columnIndex)
          Provides a foreground color for the given cell.
 

Method Detail

getForeground

public org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color getForeground(java.lang.Object element,
                                                    int columnIndex)
Provides a foreground color for the given cell.

Parameters:
element - the element
columnIndex - the zero-based index of the column in which the color is set
Returns:
the foreground color for the cell, or null to use the default foreground color

getBackground

public org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color getBackground(java.lang.Object element,
                                                    int columnIndex)
Provides a background color for the given cell.

Parameters:
element - the element
columnIndex - the zero-based index of the column in which the color is set
Returns:
the background color for the cell, or null to use the default background color
